t: Children's Privacy Disclosure - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · Children's privacy is important to Amazon. This disclosure and the Amazon Privacy Notice describe how we handle personal information we collect from children under the age of 13 ("child" or "children")

t: About Amazon Kids Privacy - Amazon Customer Service
s: We use your child's profile to provide a customized experience in Amazon Kids. In setting up your child's profile, we ask you to provide the child's screen name (which can be any word you choose), and birthdate.

t: Manage Kids' Account via Amazon Parent Dashboard - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to manage your child's Amazon Kids profile, content, and features through the Parent Dashboard. Set screen time limits, control device access, and adjust age filters.
